# About

This is my online Learning diary.

In CASA0023 we are asked to make a portfolio that will help us in the future.

Hi! I am Sameera. Reading maps has fascinated me ever since I attended cartography lessons back in school; however, I never knew that I would find my calling in the same field in the future. It is exhilarating how I followed my passion and entered the field of GIS after spending over six years working as a lecturer at an undergraduate college.
